properties.description: A safe place where all are welcome. Join us for a cuppa, a conversation and at lunchtime, hot soup and a roll. We are open from 10.00-2.00 every Friday. properties.description: Worthing Museum and Gallery is available as a Warm Space with exhibitions and displays for every age. We even have a book corner! The venue will be open on the following days/times. Free hot drinks, baked goods and activity packs will be available on Thursdays, 3pm – 8pm. On Thursday evenings we will also have representatives from different charities and support groups to offer advice and raise awareness. Keep an eye out on our website for who will be coming and when. https://wtm.uk/warmspaces/ Wed 10am – 5pm Thurs 10am – 8pm ( 3-8pm hot drinks and baked goods) Fri 10am – 5pm Sat 10am – 5pm Sun 11am – 3pm Worthing Museum : Chapel Rd, Worthing BN11 1HP

properties.description: Broadwater Support has a community Hub at 32 South Farm Rd BN14 7AE. It includes a Community Pantry for those who are struggling to manage. It also offers a Pet Pantry, School Uniform centre and a free cafe where people can have free drinks and chat to the volunteers. The Warm Hub will be open weekday afternoons until 3pm. Everybody is welcome.

hours._text: Broadwater Support has a community Hub at 32 South Farm Rd BN14 7AE. It includes a Community Pantry for those who are struggling to manage. It also offers a Pet Pantry, School Uniform centre and a free cafe where people can have free drinks and chat to the volunteers. The Warm Hub will be open weekday afternoons until 3pm. Everybody is welcome.

properties.description: Fraser’s Bar in the Connaught Theatre From Monday 8th January 2024 until Monday 11th March 2024 Fraser’s Bar – Upstairs in the Connaught Theatre will be open on Mondays between 3pm – 8pm, with free hot drinks, Baked goods, activity packs, books, board games and a kindness rack (with free warm clothes that anyone is welcome to take). On Monday evenings we will also have representatives from different charities and support groups to offer advice and raise awareness more information can be found here https://wtm.uk/warmspaces
